articles.description: Leave your iPhone at home and stream directly to your Bluetooth headphones...
articles.content:
Spotify has added standalone streaming support to its Apple Watch app. The update means Spotify users can stream music or podcasts over wi-fi or data without connecting to an iPhone.

articles.description: The Panasonic S 85mm f/1.8 is the first of four uniform-sized prime lenses for full-frame L-mount cameras
articles.content:
The Panasonic Lumix S 85mm f/1.8 the first of four uniform-sized, full-frame f/1.8 prime lenses has been officially announced by Panasonic.
